Description:
To plan, implement and direct the overall sales activities of the Company to achieve sales objectives. He directs the team’s focus, set goals, motivates, looks at figures, analyzes budgets, and determines ways to streamline and improve the sales process.The position supports Management by contributing to the successful operation of the Retail Showrooms of DAJ- Co-operatives and Wholesale, and implementation of strategies. Meeting Sales Goals, Negotiation, Market Demand, Sales Planning, Building Relationships, Staff Training, Managing Processes, Market Knowledge, Developing Budgets, and Staffing.The primary responsibilities of a Head of retail are Vendor Management, Pricing & Marketing, and Planning & Stock Replenishment and ControlDetermines annual unit and gross-profit plans by implementing marketing strategies; analyzing trends and results.
Establishes sales objectives by forecasting and developing annual sales quotas for each Sales Channel; projecting expected sales volume and profit for existing and new products.
Develops a business plan and sales strategy that ensures attainment of company sales goals and profitability.
Responsible for the performance and development of the Sales Key Accounts.
Prepares action plans by individuals as well as by team for effective search of new sales leads and prospects.
Initiates and coordinates development of action plans to penetrate new markets.
Assists in the development and implementation of marketing plans for as needed.
Conducts one-on-one review with all Key Account to build more effective communications, and to provide insight for the improvement of Account’s sales and activity performance.
Provides timely, accurate, competitive pricing on all completed prospect applications submitted for pricing and approval, while striving to maintain maximum profit margin.
Maintains accurate records of all pricings, sales, and activity reports.
Assists in preparation of Sales proposals and presentations and annual Budget.
Controls expenses to meet budget guidelines.
Adheres to all company policies, procedures and business ethics codes and ensures that they are communicated and implemented within the team.
Hiring and training new sales representatives. Schedule /Intercompany transfer of Sales Staff, assign daily duties and motivate the sales staff at any retail location.
Provide staff with product update knowledge
Motivate sales team to meet or exceed sales goals
Notify staff of new procedures or policies.
Maintains sales staff job results by counseling and disciplining employees; planning, monitoring, and appraising job results.Skills
